thread.title: Sports world reacts to Patriots' Super Bowl win
thread.title_full: Sports world reacts to Patriots' Super Bowl win

author: USA TODAY
title: Sports world reacts to Patriots' Super Bowl win
text:
Sports world reacts to Patriots' Super Bowl win The entire sports world was very impressed. Post to Facebook Sports world reacts to Patriots' Super Bowl win The entire sports world was very impressed.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/sports-reaction-twitter-patriots-super-bowl-51-win-falcons-kobe-ortiz-marshawn-nfl/   Sports world reacts to Patriots' Super Bowl win Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 11:11 p.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady (12) celebrates after beating the Atlanta Falcons during Super Bowl LI at NRG Stadium. (Photo: Matthew Emmons-USA TODAY Sports) 
The New England Patriots came from behind to beat the Atlanta Falcons in overtime of what may have been the greatest Super Bowl game of all time . 
Other NFL players and other pro athletes were as amazed at what happened on Sunday night as you were. The Falcons looked like they had the game on lock until Tom Brady and the Pats stormed all the way back for the win . 
Here's a very small sampling of reaction from around the NFL, NBA, WNBA and MLB: I kno y I didn't get the ball now. Yes Lawd â€” Shawn Lynch (@MoneyLynch) February 6, 2017 Can't wait for Roger Goodell to hand that trophy to Tom Brady so he can look at him like pic.twitter.com/osn4azbgBS
